name: MSCRMExtractCMData
description: Extracts the data zip exported using Configuration Migration Tool into folder with the option split and sort the data.xml
author: Wael Hamze
helpMarkDown: More information on Configuration Migration Tools can be found [here](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-platform/admin/manage-configuration-data)

inputs.name: dataFile
inputs.label: Data File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The absolute path to exported data zip file

inputs.name: extractFolder
inputs.label: Extract Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The absolute path to the folder for storing the extracted data files

inputs.name: sortExtractedData
inputs.label: Sort Data Xml
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true to sort the records in the data.xml by Ids for easier version control management

inputs.name: splitExtractedData
inputs.label: Split Data Xml
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true to split the data.xml into mutiple files per entity i.e. entityname_data.xml
